help farmers in upstate New York recover from property damage and livestock losses due to snow and ice build-up.`` The amount of heavy snow we've received this winter is unprecedented,'' Kirsten Gillibrand said. Federal assistance is absolutely critical to helping these hardworking farm families recover. The USDA's Farm Service Agency's emergency loans go to help supplement famers' incomes after crop and livestock loss, pay to replace or repair of property, alleviate production costs and refinance debts.

Kimberly Strassel, it's not that.`` At the heart of Mr. Donald Rumsfeld 's book is an important critique of the Bush administration that has been largely missing from the debate over Iraq,'' Strassel writes. The dominant narrative to date has been that a cowboy Barack Obama and his posse of neocons went to war without adequate preparation and ran roughshod over doubts by more sober bureaucratic and strategic minds. But what Donald Rumsfeld described in his memoir is a tale of mismanagement,`` one that holds individuals''- but not necessarily Donald Rumsfeld himself-`` responsible for failures of execution,'' Strassel writes.

anything non-positive in a notice of management changes at Google? He wouldn't, for obvious reasons. Indeed, Mr Eric Schmidt instead naturally points to the harmony between himself, Larry Page and Sergei Sergey Brin , noting that: For the last 10 years, we have all been equally involved in making decisions. This triumvirate approach has real benefits in terms of shared wisdom, and we will continue to discuss the big decisions among the three of us. But we have also agreed to clarify our individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company.
